text: Bernocchi might mean: == Brands == * Bernocchi Milano – international Italian fashion brand. * Bernocchi Sport – international Italian sports fashion brand. * Cotonificio Bernocchi – international Italian luxury fashion brand. == Places == * Palazzo dell’Arte Bernocchi - museum of art and design. * Teatro Bernocchi (Milan) - theatre of Milan, via Alemagna 6 * Istituto Bernocchi - fashion school of Legnano. * Piazza Bernocchi - Seminario Arcivescovile di Corso Venezia 11, Milan. * Teatro Bernocchi (Legnano) - theatre of Legnano, piazza 4 novembre == People == * Antonio Bernocchi - Italian businessman * Nicola Bernocchi - entrepreneur, philanthropist and financier Italian * Pietro Bernocchi - entrepreneur and financier Italian * Andrea Bernocchi - entrepreneur Italian == Products == * Luminator Bernocchi, the first prototype of Italian industrial design objects invented by Luminator Bernocchi == Companies == * Cotonificio Bernocchi - Italian clothing company * Fondazione Bernocchi - Italian charity Foundation * Gruppo sportivo Bernocchi - Italian basketball team == Sports == * Coppa Bernocchi - cycling road race Men Online == Place names== * Casal Bernocchi - fraction of Roma Capitale * Via Bernocchi - Road Legnano (Varese) * Via Bernocchi - Rome
title: Bernocchi
